articles.title: This is what Trump must do if he's facing off with Biden in November
articles.description: Joe Biden won three states by less than 1 point in 2020: Georgia, Arizona and Wisconsin. If Donald Trump can flip them in November — he took all three in 2016 — he’ll be back in the White House this time next year.
articles.content:
Joe Biden won three states by less than 1 point in 2020: Georgia, Arizona and Wisconsin.
